name: Prasiddh Shahar
declaringWar: We will rid you from this planet, and any other planets we can find.
attacked: You will learn the hard way that we have returned fully prepared for war.
defeated: Is this world always doomed to suffer war? Surely we can do better than this...
introduction: Greetings! I wish we could meet under better circumstances, but this will do.
tradeRequest: My friend, are you interested in this arrangement?
